verses.verse: Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5020><s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>, unto <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H5972>peoples<s%>, <S%H524>nations<s%>, and <S%H3961>languages<s%>, that <S%H1753>dwell<s%> in <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H772>earth<s%>: <S%H8001>Peace<s%> be multiplied unto <S%H7680>you<s%>.

It hath <S%H6925>seemed<s%> <S%H8232>good<s%> unto me to <S%H2324>show<s%> the <S%H852>signs<s%> and <S%H8540>wonders<s%> that the Most <S%H5943>High<s%> <S%H426>God<s%> hath <S%H5648>wrought<s%> toward <S%H5974>me<s%>.

How <S%H4101><s%> <S%H7260>great<s%> are his <S%H852>signs<s%>! and <S%H4101>how<s%> <S%H8624>mighty<s%> are his <S%H8540>wonders<s%>! his <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> is an <S%H5957>everlasting<s%> <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>, and his <S%H7985>dominion<s%> is <S%H5974>from<s%> <S%H1859>generation<s%> to <S%H1859>generation<s%>.
I <S%H576><s%>, <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%>, <S%H1934>was<s%> at <S%H7954>rest<s%> in my <S%H1005>house<s%>, and <S%H7487>flourishing<s%> in my <S%H1965>palace<s%>.

I <S%H2370>saw<s%> a <S%H2493>dream<s%> which made me <S%H1763>afraid<s%>; and the <S%H2031>thoughts<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> my <S%H4903>bed<s%> and the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of my <S%H7217>head<s%> troubled <S%H927>me<s%>.

Therefore <S%H4481><s%> <S%H7761>made<s%> <S%H4481>I<s%> a <S%H2942>decree<s%> to <S%H5954>bring<s%> in <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of <S%H895>Babylon<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> <S%H3046>me<s%>, that they might make known unto me the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%> of the <S%H2493>dream<s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> <S%H5954>came<s%> in the <S%H2749>magicians<s%>, the <S%H826>enchanters<s%>, the <S%H3779>Chaldeans<s%>, and the <S%H1505>soothsayers<s%>; and <S%H576>I<s%> <S%H560>told<s%> the <S%H2493>dream<s%> <S%H6925>before<s%> <S%H3809>them<s%>; but they did not make <S%H3046>known<s%> unto me the interpretation <S%H6591>thereof<s%>.

But <S%H5705>at<s%> the <S%H318>last<s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%> came <S%H5922>in<s%> before <S%H6925>me<s%>, whose <S%H8036>name<s%> was <S%H1096>Belteshazzar<s%>, according to the <S%H8036>name<s%> of my <S%H426>god<s%>, and in whom is the <S%H7308>spirit<s%> of the <S%H6922>holy<s%> <S%H426>gods<s%>: and I <S%H560>told<s%> the <S%H2493>dream<s%> before <S%H6925>him<s%>, saying,

O <S%H1096>Belteshazzar<s%>, <S%H7229>master<s%> of the <S%H2749>magicians<s%>, because <S%H576>I<s%> <S%H3046>know<s%> that the <S%H7308>spirit<s%> of the <S%H6922>holy<s%> <S%H426>gods<s%> is in <S%H3606>thee<s%>, and no <S%H7328>secret<s%> <S%H598>troubleth<s%> <S%H560>thee<s%>, tell me the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of my <S%H2493>dream<s%> that I have <S%H2370>seen<s%>, and the interpretation <S%H6591>thereof<s%>.

Thus were the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of my <S%H7217>head<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> my <S%H4903>bed<s%>: I <S%H1934>saw<s%>, <S%H431>and<s%>, behold, a <S%H363>tree<s%> in the <S%H1459>midst<s%> of the <S%H772>earth<s%>; and the <S%H7314>height<s%> thereof was <S%H7690>great<s%>.

The <S%H363>tree<s%> <S%H7236>grew<s%>, and was <S%H8631>strong<s%>, and the <S%H7314>height<s%> thereof <S%H4291>reached<s%> unto <S%H8065>heaven<s%>, and the <S%H2379>sight<s%> thereof to the <S%H5491>end<s%> of <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H772>earth<s%>.

The <S%H6074>leaves<s%> thereof were <S%H8209>fair<s%>, and the <S%H4>fruit<s%> thereof <S%H7690>much<s%>, and in it was <S%H4203>food<s%> for <S%H3606>all<s%>: the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> of the <S%H1251>field<s%> had <S%H2927>shadow<s%> <S%H8460>under<s%> <S%H6853>it<s%>, and the birds of the <S%H8065>heavens<s%> <S%H1753>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H6056>branches<s%> <S%H3606>thereof<s%>, and all <S%H1321>flesh<s%> was <S%H2110>fed<s%> from <S%H4481>it<s%>.

I <S%H1934>saw<s%> in the <S%H2376>visions<s%> of my <S%H7217>head<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> my <S%H4903>bed<s%>, <S%H431>and<s%>, behold, a <S%H5894>watcher<s%> and a holy <S%H6922>one<s%> came <S%H5182>down<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H8065>heaven<s%>.

He <S%H7123>cried<s%> <S%H2429>aloud<s%>, and <S%H560>said<s%> <S%H3652>thus<s%>, Hew <S%H1414>down<s%> the <S%H363>tree<s%>, and cut <S%H7113>off<s%> its <S%H6056>branches<s%>, shake <S%H5426>off<s%> its <S%H6074>leaves<s%>, and <S%H921>scatter<s%> its <S%H4>fruit<s%>: let the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> get <S%H5111>away<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> under <S%H8479>it<s%>, and the <S%H6853>fowls<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> its <S%H6056>branches<s%>.

Nevertheless <S%H1297><s%> <S%H7662>leave<s%> the <S%H6136>stump<s%> of its <S%H8330>roots<s%> in the <S%H772>earth<s%>, even with a <S%H613>band<s%> of <S%H6523>iron<s%> and <S%H5174>brass<s%>, in the tender <S%H1883>grass<s%> of the <S%H1251>field<s%>; and let it be <S%H6647>wet<s%> with the <S%H2920>dew<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%>: and let his <S%H2508>portion<s%> be <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> in the <S%H6211>grass<s%> of the <S%H772>earth<s%>:

let his <S%H3825>heart<s%> be <S%H8133>changed<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H606>man<s%>'s, and let a <S%H2423>beast<s%>'s <S%H3825>heart<s%> be <S%H3052>given<s%> unto <S%H7655>him<s%>; and let seven <S%H5732>times<s%> <S%H2499>pass<s%> over <S%H5922>him<s%>.

The <S%H6600>sentence<s%> is by the <S%H1510>decree<s%> of the <S%H5894>watchers<s%>, and the <S%H7595>demand<s%> by the <S%H3983>word<s%> of the holy <S%H6922>ones<s%>; <S%H5705>to<s%> the <S%H1701>intent<s%> that the <S%H2417>living<s%> may <S%H3046>know<s%> that the Most <S%H5943>High<s%> <S%H7990>ruleth<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> of <S%H606>men<s%>, and <S%H5415>giveth<s%> it to <S%H4479>whomsoever<s%> he <S%H6634>will<s%>, and setteth <S%H6966>up<s%> <S%H5922>over<s%> it the <S%H8215>lowest<s%> of <S%H606>men<s%>.

This <S%H1836><s%> <S%H2493>dream<s%> <S%H576>I<s%>, <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%>, have <S%H2370>seen<s%>; and <S%H607>thou<s%>, O <S%H1096>Belteshazzar<s%>, <S%H560>declare<s%> the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%>, forasmuch <S%H6903>as<s%> <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H2445>wise<s%> men of my <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> are <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H3202>able<s%> to make <S%H3046>known<s%> unto me the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%>; but <S%H607>thou<s%> art <S%H3546>able<s%>; for the <S%H7308>spirit<s%> of the <S%H6922>holy<s%> gods is in <S%H426>thee<s%>.

Then <S%H116><s%> <S%H1841>Daniel<s%>, whose <S%H8036>name<s%> was <S%H1096>Belteshazzar<s%>, was stricken <S%H8075>dumb<s%> for <S%H2298>a<s%> <S%H8160>while<s%>, and his <S%H7476>thoughts<s%> <S%H927>troubled<s%> <S%H4430>him<s%>. The king <S%H560>answered<s%> and <S%H6032>said<s%>, <S%H1096>Belteshazzar<s%>, let <S%H409>not<s%> the <S%H2493>dream<s%>, or the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%>, <S%H927>trouble<s%> <S%H1096>thee<s%>. Belteshazzar <S%H6032>answered<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%>, My <S%H4756>lord<s%>, the <S%H2493>dream<s%> be to them that <S%H8131>hate<s%> <S%H6591>thee<s%>, and the interpretation thereof to thine <S%H6146>adversaries<s%>.

The <S%H363>tree<s%> that thou <S%H2370>sawest<s%>, which <S%H7236>grew<s%>, and was <S%H8631>strong<s%>, whose <S%H7314>height<s%> <S%H4291>reached<s%> unto <S%H8065>heaven<s%>, and the <S%H2379>sight<s%> thereof to <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H772>earth<s%>;

whose <S%H6074>leaves<s%> were <S%H8209>fair<s%>, and the <S%H4>fruit<s%> thereof <S%H7690>much<s%>, and in it was <S%H4203>food<s%> for <S%H3606>all<s%>; <S%H8460>under<s%> which the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> of the <S%H1251>field<s%> <S%H1753>dwelt<s%>, and upon whose <S%H6056>branches<s%> the <S%H6853>birds<s%> of the <S%H8065>heavens<s%> had their <S%H7932>habitation<s%>:

it is <S%H607>thou<s%>, O <S%H4430>king<s%>, that art <S%H7236>grown<s%> and become <S%H8631>strong<s%>; for thy <S%H7238>greatness<s%> is <S%H7236>grown<s%>, and <S%H4291>reacheth<s%> unto <S%H8065>heaven<s%>, and thy <S%H7985>dominion<s%> to the <S%H5491>end<s%> of the <S%H772>earth<s%>.

And whereas the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H2370>saw<s%> a <S%H5894>watcher<s%> and a holy <S%H6922>one<s%> coming <S%H5182>down<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H8065>heaven<s%>, and <S%H560>saying<s%>, <S%H1414>Hew<s%> <S%H1414>down<s%> the <S%H363>tree<s%>, and <S%H2255>destroy<s%> <S%H1297>it<s%>; nevertheless <S%H7662>leave<s%> the <S%H6136>stump<s%> of the <S%H8330>roots<s%> thereof in the <S%H772>earth<s%>, even with a <S%H613>band<s%> of <S%H6523>iron<s%> and <S%H5174>brass<s%>, in the tender <S%H1883>grass<s%> of the <S%H1251>field<s%>, and let it be <S%H6647>wet<s%> with the <S%H2920>dew<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%>: and let his <S%H2508>portion<s%> be <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> of the <S%H1251>field<s%>, <S%H5705>till<s%> <S%H7655>seven<s%> <S%H5732>times<s%> <S%H2499>pass<s%> over <S%H5922>him<s%>;

this <S%H1836><s%> is the <S%H6591>interpretation<s%>, O <S%H4430>king<s%>, and <S%H1932>it<s%> is the <S%H1510>decree<s%> of the Most <S%H5943>High<s%>, which is <S%H4291>come<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> my <S%H4756>lord<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%>:

that thou shalt be <S%H2957>driven<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H606>men<s%>, and thy <S%H4070>dwelling<s%> shall <S%H1934>be<s%> <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> of the <S%H1251>field<s%>, and thou shalt be made to <S%H2939>eat<s%> <S%H6211>grass<s%> as <S%H8450>oxen<s%>, and shalt be <S%H6647>wet<s%> with the <S%H2920>dew<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%>, and <S%H7655>seven<s%> <S%H5732>times<s%> shall <S%H2499>pass<s%> <S%H5922>over<s%> <S%H5705>thee<s%>; till thou <S%H3046>know<s%> that the Most <S%H5943>High<s%> <S%H7990>ruleth<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> of <S%H606>men<s%>, and <S%H5415>giveth<s%> it to <S%H4479>whomsoever<s%> he <S%H6634>will<s%>.

And whereas they <S%H560>commanded<s%> to <S%H7662>leave<s%> the <S%H6136>stump<s%> of the <S%H8330>roots<s%> of the <S%H363>tree<s%>; thy <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> shall be <S%H7011>sure<s%> unto <S%H4481>thee<s%>, after that thou shalt have <S%H3046>known<s%> that the <S%H8065>heavens<s%> do <S%H7990>rule<s%>.

Wherefore <S%H3861><s%>, O <S%H4430>king<s%>, let my <S%H4431>counsel<s%> be <S%H8232>acceptable<s%> unto <S%H5922>thee<s%>, and break <S%H6562>off<s%> thy <S%H2408>sins<s%> by <S%H6665>righteousness<s%>, and thine <S%H5758>iniquities<s%> by showing <S%H2604>mercy<s%> to the <S%H6033>poor<s%>; <S%H2006>if<s%> there may <S%H1934>be<s%> a <S%H754>lengthening<s%> of thy <S%H7963>tranquillity<s%>.
All <S%H3606><s%> this <S%H4291>came<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> the <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%>.
At the <S%H7118>end<s%> of <S%H8648>twelve<s%> <S%H3393>months<s%> he was <S%H1934>walking<s%> <S%H5922>in<s%> the <S%H4437>royal<s%> <S%H1965>palace<s%> of <S%H895>Babylon<s%>.

The <S%H4430>king<s%> <S%H6032>spake<s%> and <S%H560>said<s%>, <S%H576>Is<s%> <S%H3809>not<s%> <S%H1932>this<s%> <S%H7229>great<s%> <S%H895>Babylon<s%>, which <S%H576>I<s%> have <S%H1124>built<s%> for the <S%H4437>royal<s%> <S%H8632>dwelling-place<s%>, by the might of my <S%H2632>power<s%> and for the <S%H3367>glory<s%> of my <S%H1923>majesty<s%>?

While <S%H5751><s%> the <S%H4406>word<s%> was in the <S%H4430>king<s%>'s <S%H6433>mouth<s%>, there <S%H5308>fell<s%> a <S%H7032>voice<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H8065>heaven<s%>, <S%H4430>saying<s%>, O king <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%>, to thee it is <S%H560>spoken<s%>: The <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> is <S%H5709>departed<s%> from <S%H4481>thee<s%>:

and thou shalt be <S%H2957>driven<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H606>men<s%>; and thy <S%H4070>dwelling<s%> shall be <S%H5974>with<s%> the <S%H2423>beasts<s%> of the <S%H1251>field<s%>; thou shalt be made to <S%H2939>eat<s%> <S%H6211>grass<s%> as <S%H8450>oxen<s%>; and <S%H7655>seven<s%> <S%H5732>times<s%> shall <S%H2499>pass<s%> <S%H5922>over<s%> <S%H5705>thee<s%>; until thou <S%H3046>know<s%> that the Most <S%H5943>High<s%> <S%H7990>ruleth<s%> in the <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> of <S%H606>men<s%>, and <S%H5415>giveth<s%> it to <S%H4479>whomsoever<s%> he <S%H6634>will<s%>.

The same <S%H8160>hour<s%> was the <S%H4406>thing<s%> <S%H5487>fulfilled<s%> <S%H5922>upon<s%> <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%>: and he was <S%H2957>driven<s%> <S%H4481>from<s%> <S%H606>men<s%>, and did <S%H399>eat<s%> <S%H6211>grass<s%> as <S%H8450>oxen<s%>, and his <S%H1655>body<s%> was <S%H6647>wet<s%> with the <S%H2920>dew<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%>, <S%H5705>till<s%> his <S%H8177>hair<s%> was <S%H7236>grown<s%> like <S%H5403>eagles<s%>' <S%H2953>feathers<s%>, and his nails like <S%H6853>birds<s%>' claws.

And at the <S%H7118>end<s%> of the <S%H3118>days<s%> <S%H576>I<s%>, <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%>, lifted <S%H5191>up<s%> mine <S%H5870>eyes<s%> unto <S%H8065>heaven<s%>, and mine <S%H4486>understanding<s%> <S%H8421>returned<s%> unto <S%H5922>me<s%>, and I <S%H1289>blessed<s%> the Most <S%H5943>High<s%>, and I <S%H7624>praised<s%> and <S%H1922>honored<s%> him that <S%H2417>liveth<s%> for <S%H5957>ever<s%>; for his <S%H7985>dominion<s%> is an <S%H5957>everlasting<s%> <S%H7985>dominion<s%>, and his <S%H4437>kingdom<s%> <S%H5974>from<s%> <S%H1859>generation<s%> to <S%H1859>generation<s%>.

And <S%H3606>all<s%> the <S%H1753>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H772>earth<s%> are <S%H2804>reputed<s%> as <S%H3809>nothing<s%>; and he <S%H5648>doeth<s%> according to his <S%H6634>will<s%> in the <S%H2429>army<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%>, and among the <S%H1753>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H772>earth<s%>; and <S%H3809>none<s%> <S%H383>can<s%> <S%H4223>stay<s%> his <S%H3028>hand<s%>, or <S%H560>say<s%> unto <S%H4101>him<s%>, What doest <S%H5648>thou<s%>?

At the same <S%H2166>time<s%> mine <S%H4486>understanding<s%> <S%H8421>returned<s%> unto <S%H5922>me<s%>; and for the <S%H3367>glory<s%> of my <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>, my <S%H1923>majesty<s%> and <S%H2122>brightness<s%> <S%H8421>returned<s%> unto <S%H5922>me<s%>; and my <S%H1907>counsellors<s%> and my <S%H7261>lords<s%> <S%H1156>sought<s%> unto <S%H5922>me<s%>; and I was <S%H8627>established<s%> in my <S%H4437>kingdom<s%>, and <S%H3493>excellent<s%> <S%H7238>greatness<s%> was added unto <S%H3255>me<s%>.

Now <S%H3705><s%> <S%H576>I<s%>, <S%H5020>Nebuchadnezzar<s%>, <S%H7624>praise<s%> and <S%H7313>extol<s%> and <S%H1922>honor<s%> the <S%H4430>King<s%> of <S%H8065>heaven<s%>; for <S%H3606>all<s%> his <S%H4567>works<s%> are <S%H7187>truth<s%>, and his <S%H735>ways<s%> <S%H1780>justice<s%>; and those that <S%H1981>walk<s%> in <S%H1467>pride<s%> he is <S%H3202>able<s%> to <S%H8214>abase<s%>.
